metadata.Title: CVE-2009-3042 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in machine.php in Open Computer and Software (OCS) Inventory NG 1.02.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the systemid parameter, a different vector than CVE-2009-3040.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2009-3042` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ocsinventory-reports - 2.0.5-1.1
ocsinventory-server - 2.0.5-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ocsinventory-server package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.5-1.1').
